alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Hamilton; Marion; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 10 at 10:58AM CDT until August 10 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southwestern Bledsoe County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Hamilton County in east Tennessee... Northern Marion County in east Tennessee... Sequatchie County in east Tennessee... * Until 300 PM CDT /400 PM EDT/. * At 1058 AM CDT /1158 AM EDT/, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Chattanooga, Dunlap, Signal Mountain, Walden, Whitwell, Monteagle, Fairmount, Powells Crossroads, Cartwright, Griffith Creek, Chimneys State Park, Lone Oak, Martin Springs, North Chickamauga Creek Gorge, Falling Water, Foster Falls State Park, Mowbray Mountain, Flat Top Mountain and Fiery Gizzard State Park. This includes the following streams and drainages... Little Gizzard Creek, Brimer Creek, Little Falling Water Creek, Hixson Branch, Stevenson Branch, Falls Branch, Hurricane Creek, Rogers Branch, Walker Branch, Roberts Mill Branch, Hicks Creek, Little Sequatchie River, Soddy Creek, Little Brush Creek, Falling Water Creek, Conner Creek, McGrew Creek, Coops Creek, Bridal Veil Creek, Roaring Creek, Horn Branch, South Suck Creek, Wolf Creek, Woodcock Creek, North Chickamauga Creek, Mullens Creek, Hall Creek, Marshall Fork Branch, Sulphur Branch, McAlloyd Branch, Battle Creek, Mossy Creek, Big Possum Creek, Laurel Creek, Lewis Creek, Rock Creek, Mill Creek, Big Fiery Gizzard Creek, Bethel Creek, Sawmill Creek, Cave Cove Creek, Gray Creek, McWilliams Creek, Kelley Creek, Cain Creek, Laurel Branch, Sequatchie River, Big Brush Creek, Boston Branch, Pocket Creek, Shoal Creek, Possum Creek and Tennessee River. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
